content.raw:
Well, my docker hub issue is currently resolved via this implementation [here](https://github.com/osrf/docker_images/blob/22de178b63a3e5ceeb006d817ba5ab3ba8692fe7/gazebo/gazebo6/gzserver6/Dockerfile#L8).  
`apt-key adv --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys D2486D2DD83DB69272AFE98867170598AF249743`  
But perhaps it might be worth while suggesting this securer approach in the wiki install above?
